document.discussion_title: Bullitt County Drug Task Force seizes $300,000 worth of cocaine
document.topic_text: Bullitt County Drug Task Force seizes $300,000 worth of cocaine Posted: Updated: BULLITT COUNTY, Ky. (WDRB) - Detectives with the Bullitt County Drug Task Force had been conducting a drug investigation for about one year. Sunday, deputies arrested Junior J. Guzman, 35, and Cid Alvaro, 30. Deputies also seized three kilograms of cocaine and $5,268. The cocaine has an estimated street value of $300,000. Detectives are still trying to verify the suspects' identities. Copyright 2016 WDRB News. All Rights Reserved.
